preqs: Students must have completed 72 credit points.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04}

unitName: Case studies and research in banking and finance
description: This unit aims to combine the knowledge students have achieved in their Master of Banking and Finance studies. In addition, the unit introduces a significant research component and assignment to ensure students are familiar with the scientific research method, are able to analyse research papers and understand the aim of research in contributing to theoretical concepts in finance and banking.
